PLAYER_VOTED_ENABLE: {PlayerName} voted to enable rematch ({VotesNeeded} more {VotesNeeded:Pluralise:vote|votes} needed)
PLAYER_VOTED_DISABLE: {PlayerName} voted to disable rematch ({VotesNeeded} more {VotesNeeded:Pluralise:vote|votes} needed)
PLAYER_VOTED_PRIVATE_ENABLE: You voted to enable rematch ({VotesNeeded} more {VotesNeeded:Pluralise:vote|votes} needed)
PLAYER_VOTED_PRIVATE_DISABLE: You voted to disable rematch ({VotesNeeded} more {VotesNeeded:Pluralise:vote|votes} needed)
ERROR_ALREADY_VOTED_ENABLE: You have already voted to enable rematch.
ERROR_ALREADY_VOTED_DISABLE: You have already voted to disable rematch.
ERROR_MUST_WAIT_ENABLE: You must wait for {SecondsToWait:Duration} before voting to enable rematch.
ERROR_MUST_WAIT_DISABLE: You must wait for {SecondsToWait:Duration} before voting to disable rematch.
ERROR_CANNOT_VOTE_IN_SPECTATE: Spectators are not allowed to vote to toggle rematch.
